TopicTitle: Very weird easter egg. Or i don't know what is it.

Articles.Content:
So i open up ksp, and see this. What the .....

What is it?

While switching from Main Menu to Start Game:

What. The. Hell.

My mods:

MechJeb

Kethane

Infernal robotics

Which mod could it be?

And what's the meaning of this Easter Egg?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88286-SPOILER-%28possibly%29-New-main-menu-screen?p=1313669&viewfull=1#post1313669

Sorry NNukBomba, but this keeps coming up like a bad penny, so I have to close it :/
